thread.title: Hrithik Roshan dazzles along with father Rakesh and sons Hrehaan and Hridhaan on the cover of Hello magazine – view pic
thread.title_full: Hrithik Roshan dazzles along with father Rakesh and sons Hrehaan and Hridhaan on the cover of Hello magazine – view pic

author: Karan Shah
title: Hrithik Roshan dazzles along with father Rakesh and sons Hrehaan and Hridhaan on the cover of Hello magazine – view pic
text:
Hrithik Roshan and Sussanne Khan spotted together post their divorce 
Hrithik Roshan is the one of the most good looking celebrities in India. Not only us, but everyone around us will agree to this. His killer looks make every girl weak in their legs and every guy jealous, but looks like Hrithik ain’t stopping. The actor gave us the perfect New Year gift by featuring on the cover of the Hello Magazine. However, he isn’t alone on the cover. This January edition of the popular magazine is about knowing the Roshans. So you have Hrithik’s father Rakesh and sons – Hrehaan and Hridhaan on the cover too. All of them look quite dapper on the glossy, dressed in white shirts paired with black coats and blue jeans. 
But that’s not the end of it. Wait till you see the inside pictures! From what we hear, the whole magazine has pictures of Hrehaan and Hridhaan along with daddy Hrithik. In some pictures, they are chilling at home. While in others they are playing around in a park or with their dog. In the magazine, Hrithik has also spoken about how he loves spending time with his kids. We have to say that this cover is really special and we really can’t take our eyes of it. Check it out   it   A photo posted by Hrithikrules (Hrithik Roshan) (@hrithikrules_official) on Dec 31, 2016 at 10:24pm   Hrithik and father Rakesh are waiting for the release of their next film – Kaabil . The movie, directed by Sanjay Gupta, features Hrithik and Yami (Gautam) in an intense thriller. The duo play blind characters who fall madly in love with each other and get married. However, after their wedding, things change. Two men enter their life, torture them and kill Yami . Hrithik wants revenge and he will go to any extent to get it. But why was Yami killed and will Hrithik be able to get his revenge? Well check out Kaabil in theatres near you on January 25 to know the answer to these questions! ALSO READ – Kaabil song Mon Amour teaser: Hrithik Roshan-Yami Gautam’s love track will be the dance track of the year
